pages.md:
# Remote Movie Recording Using a Web Browser

## Steps

11. **Enter a password.**

    !Password Entry Screen

12. **Choose a server type.**

    !Server Type Selection

    > ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
    > If you choose **HTTPS**, you will need to import a root certificate into the browser on your computer or tablet (see page 298).

13. **The camera will display the settings you selected.**  
    Press **MENU/OK**.

    !Settings Display

    > ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
    > You will need this information when connecting to the camera from a computer or tablet.

14. **Save the connection setting profile.**  
    Press **MENU/OK**.

    !Save Connection Setting

15. **Select CREATE NEW.**

    !Create New Connection
